author: The Canadian Press
description: It's been a long lockdown on love for Emma Sykora. But as temperatures climb and more Canadians roll up their sleeves for the first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine, Sykora is starting to think she has a shot at something special this summer.
title: 'Vaxxed and waxed, baby!': Summer heats up for single-dosed singles - Dawson Creek Mirror

author: Mark and Ben Cullen
description: “Can you recommend a plant that I can grow in a cemetery?” is a question almost as old as time.
title: Gardening in the sun: Bring on the drought - The Sudbury Star
content:

author: CBC News
description: The provincial government announced Friday it will be adding 70 permanent nursing seats to two Nova Scotia universities.
title: 70 permanent nursing seats coming to 2 Nova Scotia universities
content:
Nova Scotia is adding 70 permanent first-year nursing seats at Cape Breton University and Dalhousie University's campus in Yarmouth.
The seats, added temporarily in 2020, will cost the province $3.2… [+714 chars]
